resources.string: Hospital Finder to get details Of Nearby Hospitals clinicd and Doctors in Your Area
Search all nearby hospitals/health centres/clinics from you current mobile GPS location
Patient safety was defined by the IOM as “the prevention of harm to patients.” Emphasis is placed on the system of care delivery
hospital combines assistance to people with teaching to medical students and nurses.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
